snippet.title: Little Cities | Hand Tracking Update Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
The most loved city creator just got cozier with hand tracking. Let go of your controllers and discover a whole new way to play, crafting your little city with simple gestures that puts cozy creation, literally, at your fingertips.

Built from the ground up for VR, and tailored to play beautifully on the Quest platform, Little Cities lets players create wholesome miniature cities in idyllic island locations. Build your creations from a humble settlement to a bustling metropolis. With an exquisitely crafted soundtrack and charming visuals, Little Cities is as much about escapism to a relaxing world as it is about strategy.

Little Cities will continue to grow through post-launch updates, with this being just the first of the two currently announced (with more to be revealed soon).
----
💙 Buy Now - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/
----
🏗️Developed by Purple Yonder
🧰Published by nDreams
----
👍 Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/user/nDreamsVR?sub_confirmation=1
----

----
